                    character	Alf, named character, age 20, x 144, y 374, portrait Alf, battle_model bandrobas_archers_upg, label alf_2
                    traits		HobbitRaceAR 1, CustomBG 1, BadCommander 1, Coward 1, Just 1, KindRuler 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                    unit		Bandobras Archers					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists bilbo_1
                kill_character bilbo_1
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Bilbo, named character, age 90, x 133, y 385, portrait Bilbo, battle_model bandrobas_archers_upg, label bilbo_2
                    traits		HobbitRaceAR 1, CustomBG 1, Brave 3, GoodCommander 1, Just 3, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, Scout 2, Energetic 2
                    unit		Bandobras Archers					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists paladin_1
                kill_character paladin_1
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Paladin, named character, age 42, x 118, y 380, portrait Paladin, battle_model bandrobas_archers_upg, hero_ability CAPTAIN, label paladin_2
                    traits		Hero 1, CustomBG 1, HobbitRaceAR 1, HeroAbilityCaptain 1, GoodAdministrator 1, GoodCommander 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, MathematicsSkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                    unit		Bandobras Archers			exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                end
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists wil_1
                kill_character wil_1
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Wil, named character, age 40, x 151, y 365, portrait Wil, battle_model bandrobas_archers_upg, label wil_2
                    traits		HobbitRaceAR 1, CustomBG 1, Brave 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 2, InspiringSpeaker 1, Just 2, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                    unit		Bandobras Archers			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                end
            end_if		
            ; give ancillaries to the new characters			
            if I_CharacterExists barliman_2
                console_command give_ancillary barliman_2 major_bree
                console_command give_ancillary barliman_2 bree_armour
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists breeheir_2
                console_command give_ancillary breeheir_2 book_bilbo
                console_command give_ancillary breeheir_2 merchant_man
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists alf_2
                console_command give_ancillary alf_2 hobbit_farmer
                console_command give_ancillary alf_2 bard
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists bilbo_2
                console_command give_ancillary bilbo_2 sting
                console_command give_ancillary bilbo_2 mithril_coat
				console_command give_ancillary bilbo_2 map
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists paladin_2
                console_command give_ancillary paladin_2 thain
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists wil_2
                console_command give_ancillary wil_2 old_toby
            end_if
			if I_CharacterExists boromir_rk
                console_command give_ancillary boromir_rk high_warden
                console_command give_ancillary boromir_rk troops_gondor
                console_command give_ancillary boromir_rk gondor_horn
                console_command give_ancillary boromir_rk writings_isildur
                console_command give_ancillary boromir_rk gondor_shield
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists angbor_rk
                console_command give_ancillary angbor_rk lord_lamedon
                console_command give_ancillary angbor_rk gondor_sword
                console_command give_ancillary angbor_rk gondorian_armour
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists denethor_rk
                console_command give_ancillary denethor_rk steward_gondor
                console_command give_ancillary denethor_rk drillmaster
                console_command give_ancillary denethor_rk gondorian_armour
                console_command give_ancillary denethor_rk human_overseer
                console_command give_ancillary denethor_rk anor_stone
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists adrahil_rk
                console_command give_ancillary adrahil_rk prince_dol_amroth
                console_command give_ancillary adrahil_rk veteran_officer
                console_command give_ancillary adrahil_rk da_shield
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists imrahil_rk
                console_command give_ancillary imrahil_rk knight_armour
                console_command give_ancillary imrahil_rk war_horse
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists istion_rk
                console_command give_ancillary istion_rk lance
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists duinhir_rk
                console_command give_ancillary duinhir_rk lord_morthond
                console_command give_ancillary duinhir_rk human_miner
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists forlong_rk
                console_command give_ancillary forlong_rk lord_lossarnach
                console_command give_ancillary forlong_rk axe_lossarnach
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists golasgil_rk
                console_command give_ancillary golasgil_rk lord_anfalas
                console_command give_ancillary golasgil_rk human_overseer
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists hirluin_rk
                console_command give_ancillary hirluin_rk lord_pinnath_gelin
                console_command give_ancillary hirluin_rk gondor_shield
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists orodreth_rk
                console_command give_ancillary orodreth_rk lord_lebennin
                console_command give_ancillary orodreth_rk human_trader
            end_if
            console_command message_collation_set off
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
    

    ;###################### Script: Barrow Downs #########################

    declare_counter crypts_set
    declare_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave
	
		if I_EventCounter Barrow_Population_Bonus = 1
			console_command add_population Cardolan 50
			set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 0
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter restored_crypts = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Cardolan
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hre
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = portugal
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = france
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = poland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = england
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
                and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good = 0
                kill_character Barrow-wight
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = slave
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = sicily
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = denmark
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled denmark
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = milan
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = normans
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = scotland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = timurids
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = byzantium
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = moors
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hungary

            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = norway
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = saxons
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = ireland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = mongols

            end_if

            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = aztecs
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = spain
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = russia
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = khand
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
        and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 490, y 12
                    traits	ScriptedBesieger 2
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	TemporarySpotter, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if I_LocalFaction england
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction sicily
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction denmark
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction milan
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction normans
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction turks
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction scotland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts scotland false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction timurids
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts timurids false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts byzantium false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction moors
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts moors false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction hungary
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts hungary false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction norway
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts norway false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction saxons
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts saxons false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction ireland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts ireland false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction mongols
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts mongols false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts teutonic_order false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction venice
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts venice false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction poland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts poland false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction france
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction aztecs
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction hre
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts hre false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction portugal
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts portugal false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction spain
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts spain false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction gundabad
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts gundabad false
                end_if				
                if I_LocalFaction russia
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts russia false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction khand
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts khand false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                move TemporarySpotter, 490, 11
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
            replenish_units Barrow-wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 2
                and I_SettlementUnderSiege Cardolan
                and I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 2, 166, 372
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	TemporarySpotter, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = sicily
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = denmark
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = milan
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = normans
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = scotland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts scotland false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = timurids
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts timurids false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = byzantium
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts byzantium false

                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = norway
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts norway false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = saxons
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts saxons false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = ireland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts ireland false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = mongols
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts mongols false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = teutonic_order
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts teutonic_order false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = venice
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts venice false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = aztecs
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = spain
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = russia
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = khand
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 166, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 166, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 166, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 372
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 372
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 372
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 372
                    move TemporarySpotter, 167, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 166, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 166, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 373
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 166, 373
                end_if
                reposition_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    create_unit Barrow-wight, Snaga Catapult, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                    siege_settlement Barrow-wight, Cardolan, attack
                end_if
                set_counter sieges_testing 0
            end_if
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 0
            and RandomPercent <= 20
            inc_counter crypts_spawns 1
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 1
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_1
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_1
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_1, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 2
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_2
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_2
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_2, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 3
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_3
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4

                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end

			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 5
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_5
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false

                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end

			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 6
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_6
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_6
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_6, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 7
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_7
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_7
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_7, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 8
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_8
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_8
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_8, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 9
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_9
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_9
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_9, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_10
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_10
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_10, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
			end_if
            set_counter crypts_set 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                create_unit Barrow-wight, Rebel Barrow Wights, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Cardolan
                    and RandomPercent >= 60
                    create_unit Barrow-wight, Rebel Barrow Wights, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                    siege_settlement Barrow-wight, Cardolan, maintain
                    set_counter crypts_set 2
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good = 2
                historic_event spawned_crypts
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = restored_crypts
        historic_event restored_crypts
        change_settlement_name Cardolan Gorthad
        set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 10
        set_counter crypts_spawns 10
        destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
        if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
            kill_character Barrow-wight
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType barrow
        and I_EventCounter restored_crypts = 1
        console_command remove_ancillary this barrow
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists barrow
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor


    ;################ Script: Buildings & Settlements ####################

    ;##### Capital Change Cost

    monitor_event FactionNewCapital FactionIsLocal
        console_command add_money -150
        historic_event capital_change
    end_monitor

    ;##### Mithril Mines

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName East_Moria
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = m_mines
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
            increment_kings_purse hungary 250
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild factions { hungary, }
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
            increment_kings_purse moors 250
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild factions { moors, }
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            increment_kings_purse norway 500
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild factions { norway, }
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Osgiliath, Tharbad, Fornost & Annuminas

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName East_Osgiliath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event osgiliath_east_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName West_Osgiliath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = citadel
        historic_event osgiliath_west_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Tharbad
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event tharbad_east_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Arthedain
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = fortress
		change_settlement_name Arthedain Fornost
        historic_event fornost_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Lake_Evendim
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event annuminas_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	
	
	
	;perry modified Corsair invasions to stop if AA and Gondor are allied at those turn checks
    ;##################### Script: Corsair Invasions #####################
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal  
      
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
			and I_EventCounter adunaim_gondor_allied = 1
			terminate_monitor
	   	end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
			and I_NumberOfSettlements russia > 0
			and I_TurnNumber = 64
            historic_event umbar_fleet_mithlond
		    terminate_monitor
	    end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal  
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            terminate_monitor
		end_if  
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia 
            terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
			and I_EventCounter adunaim_gondor_allied = 1
			terminate_monitor
	   	end_if
		
		if I_NumberOfSettlements russia > 0
        and I_TurnNumber = 74
            historic_event umbar_fleet_lond_daer
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

                and I_NumberOfSettlements russia = 0

			end_if
		end_if
    end_monitor

		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia 
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter mithlond_attacked = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = russia
            historic_event corsair_take_mithlond
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter mithlond_attacked = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
            historic_event umbar_attack_mithlond_end
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if I_EventCounter mithlond_attacked = 0
            and I_TurnNumber >= 87
            terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

    ;#################### Script: Dorwinion Choice #######################
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
            historic_event dorwinion_choice factions { byzantium, }
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    declare_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer

    set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 0
    set_event_counter dorwinion_men 0

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 19
            increment_kings_purse byzantium 300
            generate_random_counter dorwinion_ai_choice 1 2
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_ai_choice = 1
                set_event_counter dorwinion_men 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, family, direction E, portrait Reginard
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_men_AI
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_ai_choice = 2
                set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, family, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Stalkers			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_elves_AI
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Nurunk = byzantium
            set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 1
            historic_event dorwinion_influence_choice true factions { byzantium, }
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType dorwinion_influence_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Stalkers			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_elves factions { byzantium, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType dorwinion_influence_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter dorwinion_men 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, direction E, portrait Reginard
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_men factions { byzantium, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and FactionType byzantium
        and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium >= 12
        and I_SettlementOwner Nurunk = byzantium
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_men = 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Stalkers			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Shadows			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Protectors			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Sentinels 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Shadows			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Shadows			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_elven_support factions { byzantium, }
            terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_elf = 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, direction E, portrait Reginard
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             	    unit		Elvellyn Infantry			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Knights			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Regent Bowguard			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Regent Axeguard			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Regent Spearguard			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_human_support factions { byzantium, }
            terminate_monitor
            end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            if I_CompareCounter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event dorwinion_influence_choice true factions { byzantium, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	;#################### Script: Bree Choice ############################
	
	declare_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer
	declare_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer
	declare_counter bree_war
	
    set_event_counter bree_military 0
    set_event_counter bree_mercenary 0
	set_counter bree_war 0
	
	if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
	end_if
	
	if I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
	end_if
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType normans
		
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType normans
		
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
		
		if I_EventCounter bree_mercenary = 1
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
			set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter bree_military = 1
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
			set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		end_if
				
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType normans
        and I_TurnNumber >= 65
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
			and I_TurnNumber = 65
			historic_event bree_choice_warning factions { normans, }
        end_if
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType normans
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction turks = AtWar
		
        set_counter bree_war 1
		terminate_monitor
		
    end_monitor
		
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType normans
        and I_TurnNumber >= 66
		
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
            if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 0
				and I_NumberOfSettlements turks > 0
                set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 1
                historic_event bree_influence_choice true factions { normans, }
				terminate_monitor
            end_if
			
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 1
				
				set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1
				
				set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
				set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
				set_event_counter bree_allied 0
				
				kill_character brathor1
				destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
				destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
				destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
				
				increment_kings_purse normans 1500
				historic_event bree_warmonger factions { normans, }
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
			
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 0
				and I_NumberOfSettlements turks = 0
				set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 1
                historic_event bree_refugees_choice true factions { normans, }
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
			
        end_if
		
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
			set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1
			
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
			set_event_counter bree_allied 0
			
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_refugees_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_military 1	;Bree Dunedain path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		
		increment_kings_purse normans -500
		
		historic_event bree_refugees_accepted factions { normans, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_refugees_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1	;Bree mercenary path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		
		kill_character brathor1
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
		destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
		
		increment_kings_purse normans 1500
		
		historic_event bree_refugees_declined factions { normans, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_influence_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_military 1	;Bree Dunedain path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		
		set_faction_standing normans turks 1
        set_faction_standing turks normans 1
		
		increment_kings_purse normans -500
		
		historic_event bree_choice_accepted factions { normans, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_influence_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1	;Bree mercenary path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		
		kill_character brathor1
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
		destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
		
		console_command diplomatic_stance normans turks neutral
		set_faction_standing normans turks -0.2
        set_faction_standing turks normans -0.2
		
		increment_kings_purse normans 1500
		
		historic_event bree_choice_declined factions { normans, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart I_TurnNumber = 70
        if I_EventCounter bree_mercenary = 1
			spawn_army
                faction normans
                character	Reginard, named character, age 27, x 161, y 382, direction E, portrait Reginard, battle_model merc_general
                traits		Reginard 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Sellswords			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Sellswords			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end
            historic_event bree_mercenary_general factions { normans, }
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter bree_military = 1
			spawn_army
                faction normans
                character	Aldaron, named character, age 27, x 119, y 377, direction E, portrait Aldaron, battle_model high_elves_general_dac
                traits		Aldaron 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Lindar 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Noldorin Horseguard			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end
            historic_event bree_elven_general factions { normans, }
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            if I_CompareCounter bree_influence_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event bree_influence_choice true factions { normans, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            if I_CompareCounter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event bree_refugees_choice true factions { normans, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
   
	;################## Script: Ered Luin Ring Choice ###################
		
 	; Event Counter Setup 
	declare_counter luin_ring_awaiting_answer
 	
	; Luin Ring Offer Prelude
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber >= 14
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			and I_TurnNumber = 14
			historic_event luin_ring_01 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Offer (Ered Luin, Mordor, Other Factions)
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber >= 29
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
			historic_event luin_ring_02 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
			historic_event luin_ring_mordor factions { england, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
		    and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
		    historic_event luin_ring_ai
		    terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Offer Elven Warning
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber = 31
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			historic_event luin_ring_03 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
    ; Luin Ring Choice
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber = 33
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
            set_counter luin_ring_awaiting_answer 1
            historic_event luin_ring_04 true factions { hungary, }
		    terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
            generate_random_counter ered_luin_ai_choice 1 2												   
            if I_EventCounter ered_luin_ai_choice = 1
                set_event_counter luin_ring_accepted 1
                set_event_counter AI_luin_ring_accepted 1
			    historic_event luin_ring_15
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary gundabad Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary portugal Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary norway Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary timurids Neutral

		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary aztecs Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary mongols Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary turks Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary france Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary hre Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary england Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary teutonic_order Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary ireland Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary poland Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary byzantium Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary moors Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary russia Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary spain Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary saxons war
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary normans Neutral
                link_faction_ai hungary evil_luin
		        set_faction_standing hungary england 1
		        set_faction_standing england hungary 1
		        set_faction_standing hungary moors -1
		        set_faction_standing moors hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing turks hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary turks -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary norway -1
		        set_faction_standing norway hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing normans hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary normans -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary saxons -1
		        set_faction_standing saxons hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary portugal 0.5
		        set_faction_standing portugal hungary 0.5
			    spawn_army
                    faction hungary
                    character	Grindfarn, named character, age 27, x 76, y 437, family, direction E, portrait Grindfarn, label grindfarn_2, battle_model grindfarn
                    traits		Grindfarn 1, DwarvenRace 1, Grimborn 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, StrategyChivalryGood 1, Energetic 2
                    unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				    unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end			
			    console_command give_ancillary grindfarn_2 dwarven_power_ring3
			    console_command give_ancillary grindfarn_2 dwarven_power_ring2
			    console_command give_ancillary grindfarn_2 dwarven_power_ring
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ered_luin_ai_choice = 2
                set_event_counter luin_ring_rejected 1
                set_event_counter AI_luin_ring_rejected 1
			    historic_event luin_ring_16
			    set_faction_standing hungary england -1
			    set_faction_standing england hungary -1
			    set_faction_standing hungary saxons 1
			    set_faction_standing saxons hungary 1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    ; Luin Ring Accepted

                faction hungary

        end_if
	end_monitor

	; Luin Ring Accepted Event 04.5 - Eriador Attack
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 50
                siege_settlement lindon_retribution_1, Nan_i_Naugrim, attack
                siege_settlement bree_retribution_1, Nan_i_Naugrim, attack
                siege_settlement dunedain_retribution_1, Nan_i_Naugrim, attack
			terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Accepted Event 05 - Dwarven Warning
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 61
	    and I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements moors > 0
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0
			historic_event luin_ring_10 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements moors > 0
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements norway = 0
			historic_event luin_ring_10 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements moors = 0
			historic_event luin_ring_10 factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Accepted Event 06.1 - Dwarven Attack Warning (Erebor & KD)
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors > Allied
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction norway > Allied
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors

	    and I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
