				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
			
			create_unit pallando_2, Variag Horse Archers,			num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_2, Warlords Kataphract Archers,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_2, Variag Bowmen,		num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_2, Khand Elite Axemen,			num 1, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			
			if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Khand
				siege_settlement pallando_2, Khand, maintain
				set_event_counter bw_siege_two 1
			end_if
			campaign_wait 0.1
			
			set_event_counter death_message 1
			historic_event blue_wizards_attack factions { khand, }
        end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter khand_loyal = 1
			and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 53
			and I_SettlementUnderSiege Harad
			and I_EventCounter bw_siege_one = 1
			
			siege_settlement alatar_2, Harad, attack
			campaign_wait 1
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter khand_loyal = 1
			and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 54
			and I_SettlementUnderSiege Khand
			and I_EventCounter bw_siege_two = 1

			siege_settlement pallando_2, Khand, attack
			campaign_wait 1
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter khand_loyal = 1
			and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 55
			
			set_event_counter blue_wizards_end 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
	end_monitor
	
;######################### Khand chooses Good (AI) ######################################

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
		and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 51
		and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_succeed = 1
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland	
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad	
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia			
			if I_SettlementOwner Harad = khand
				spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Ancantar, named character, age 48, x 490, y 140, family, portrait Ancantar, battle_model ancantar, direction W, hero_ability ANCANTAR, label ancantar_2
					traits		Ancantar 1, CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityAncantar 1, NumenoreanRace 1, Brave 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
					unit		Temple Knights					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
					unit		Temple Wards					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Temple Wards					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Temple Marksmen			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Temple Marksmen			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Great Beasts							exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Saurons Will						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
					unit		Saurons Will						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
					unit		Black Uruks					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruks					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruks					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruks					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Black Uruk Halberds				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Mordor Catapult							exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Mordor Catapult							exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				end
				
				console_command give_ancillary ancantar_2 ancantar_mace
				console_command give_ancillary ancantar_2 ancantar_dagger
				
				if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Harad
					console_command auto_win attacker
					siege_settlement ancantar_2, Harad, attack
				end_if
				campaign_wait 0.1
			end_if
		end_if
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			spawn_army
				faction england
				character	Ancantar, named character, age 48, x 418, y 230, portrait Ancantar, battle_model ancantar, direction W, hero_ability ANCANTAR, label ancantar_5
				traits		Ancantar 1, CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityAncantar 1, NumenoreanRace 1, Brave 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
				unit		Temple Knights					exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Temple Wards					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Temple Marksmen			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			
			console_command give_ancillary ancantar_5 ancantar_mace
			console_command give_ancillary ancantar_5 ancantar_dagger
			
			historic_event ancantar_mordor factions { england, }
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType khand
		and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 51
		and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_succeed = 1
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
        spawn_army
            faction khand
            character	Alatar, named character, age 33, x 491, y 174, family, portrait Alatar, battle_model alatar, direction W, hero_ability ALATAR, label alatar_3
            traits		Alatar 1, CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityAlatar 1, MaiaRace 1, Brave 1, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
            unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		
		create_unit alatar_3, Variag Horse Archers,		num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit alatar_3, Warlords Kataphracts,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit alatar_3, Variag Horse Archers,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit alatar_3, Khand Elite Axemen,	num 1, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		
		console_command give_ancillary alatar_3 alatar_staff
		console_command give_ancillary alatar_3 alatar_sword
		
		campaign_wait 0.1
		
        spawn_army
            faction khand
            character	Pallando, named character, age 33, x 491, y 176, family, portrait Pallando, battle_model pellando, direction W, hero_ability PALLANDO, label pallando_3
            traits		Pallando 1, CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityPallando 1, MaiaRace 1, Brave 1, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
            unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		
		create_unit pallando_3, Variag Horse Archers,			num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit pallando_3, Warlords Kataphract Archers,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit pallando_3, Variag Bowmen,		num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		create_unit pallando_3, Khand Elite Axemen,			num 1, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
		
		console_command give_ancillary pallando_3 pallando_staff
		console_command give_ancillary pallando_3 pallando_pouch
		
		campaign_wait 0.1
		
		set_event_counter good_khand_two 1
		set_event_counter civil_war_end 1
		set_event_counter death_message 1
		set_event_counter blue_wizards_end 1
		
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
;######################### Khand chooses Evil (AI) ######################################

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType khand
		and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 51
		and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
		and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		spawn_army
			faction khand
			character	Ancantar, named character, age 48, x 482, y 200, family, portrait Ancantar, battle_model ancantar, direction E, hero_ability ANCANTAR, label ancantar_4
			traits		Ancantar 1, CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityAncantar 1, NumenoreanRace 1, Brave 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
			unit		Temple Knights					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
			unit		Temple Wards					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Temple Wards					exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Temple Marksmen			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Temple Marksmen			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Great Beasts							exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Horsemen						exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Horsemen						exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Axemen						exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Axemen						exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Warriors					exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Nomad Warriors					exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Khand Elite Axemen						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Khand Elite Axemen						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Variag Horse Archers						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Variag Horse Archers						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Warlords Kataphract Archers				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Warlords Kataphract Archers				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Warlords Kataphracts						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Warlords Kataphracts						exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		
		console_command give_ancillary ancantar_4 ancantar_mace
		console_command give_ancillary ancantar_4 ancantar_dagger

		campaign_wait 0.1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave
		and I_CompareCounter khand_timer = 51
		and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_SettlementOwner Harad = khand
			spawn_army
				faction scripts
				character	Alatar, named character, age 33, x 490, y 145, portrait AlatarAi, hero_ability ALATAR, label alatar_4
				traits		CustomBG 1, HeroAbilityAlatar 1, MaiaRace 1, Brave 1, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
				unit		Iron Fist Hammers		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
			console_command give_trait alatar_4 Alatar 1
			console_command give_ancillary alatar_4 alatar_staff
			console_command give_ancillary alatar_4 alatar_sword
			send_character_off_map alatar_4
			spawn_army
				faction slave
				character	alatar_4, named character, x 490, y 140, direction W, battle_model alatar
				unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
				
			create_unit alatar_4, Variag Horse Archers,		num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit alatar_4, Warlords Kataphracts,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit alatar_4, Variag Horse Archers,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit alatar_4, Khand Elite Axemen,	num 1, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			
			if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Harad
				console_command auto_win attacker
				siege_settlement alatar_4, Harad, attack
			end_if
			campaign_wait 0.1
            historic_event blue_wizards_attack_ai factions { england, france, poland, gundabad, russia, spain, venice, portugal, aztecs, hre, }
            historic_event blue_wizards_perish factions { hungary, saxons, turks, normans, teutonic_order, milan, sicily, denmark, norway, timurids, ireland, mongols, moors, scotland, byzantium, }
		end_if
		
		
		if I_SettlementOwner Khand = khand
			spawn_army
				faction scripts
				character	Pallando, named character, age 33, x 492, y 145, portrait PallandoAi, hero_ability PALLANDO, label pallando_4
				traits		HeroAbilityPallando 1, CustomBG 1, MaiaRace 1, Brave 1, Energetic 1, GoodCommander 3, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 1
				unit		Blacklock Engineers	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
			console_command give_trait pallando_4 Pallando 1
			console_command give_ancillary pallando_4 pallando_staff
			console_command give_ancillary pallando_4 pallando_pouch
			send_character_off_map pallando_4
			spawn_army
				faction slave
				character	pallando_4, named character, x 492, y 167, direction W, battle_model pellando
				unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Blacklock Engineers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Iron Fist Hammers			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Shields			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Kings Axes			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Dwarven Catapult					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			
			create_unit pallando_4, Variag Horse Archers,			num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_4, Warlords Kataphract Archers,	num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_4, Variag Bowmen,		num 2, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit pallando_4, Khand Elite Axemen,			num 1, exp 3, arm 0, wep 0
			
			if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Khand
				console_command auto_win attacker
				siege_settlement pallando_4, Khand, attack
			end_if
			campaign_wait 0.1
			if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_attack_ai = 0
				historic_event blue_wizards_attack_ai factions { england, france, poland, gundabad, russia, spain, venice, portugal, aztecs, hre, }
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_perish = 0
				historic_event blue_wizards_perish factions { hungary, saxons, turks, normans, teutonic_order, milan, sicily, denmark, norway, timurids, ireland, mongols, moors, scotland, byzantium, }
			end_if
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter death_message 1
		set_event_counter blue_wizards_end 1
		
		if I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 0
			kill_character alatar_4
			kill_character pallando_4
			destroy_units slave Blacklock Engineers
			destroy_units slave Iron Fist Hammers
			destroy_units slave Kings Shields
			destroy_units slave Kings Shields
			destroy_units slave Kings Axes
			destroy_units slave Dwarven Catapult
			
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
;######################### Death messages of the enemy unique characters ################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_EventCounter death_message = 1
        
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
			and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		;###### Good Khand ######
		
		if I_EventCounter ancantar_attack = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ancantar_mace
            historic_event ancantar_dead
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		
		;###### Evil Khand ######
		
        if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_attack = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists pallando_staff
			and I_EventCounter pallando_dead = 0
            historic_event pallando_dead
			if I_EventCounter alatar_dead = 1
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_attack = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists alatar_staff
			and I_EventCounter alatar_dead = 0
            historic_event alatar_dead
			if I_EventCounter pallando_dead = 1
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
        end_if
		
		;###### Mordor ######
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists pallando_staff
			and I_EventCounter pallando_dead_mordor = 0
            historic_event pallando_dead_mordor factions { england, }
			if I_EventCounter alatar_dead_mordor = 1
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
        end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists alatar_staff
			and I_EventCounter alatar_dead_mordor = 0
            historic_event alatar_dead_mordor factions { england, }
			if I_EventCounter pallando_dead_mordor = 1
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
        end_if
	end_monitor
		
	;;;;Monitor to prevent the player from disabling the choice event by exiting the game
	monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction khand
            if I_CompareCounter blue_wizards_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event blue_wizards_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	;########################## Script: Khand KP Bonus #########################
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType khand
		and I_EventCounter khand_horde_choice_accepted = 1
				set_kings_purse khand 3000
			    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType khand
		and I_TurnNumber >= 1
		and I_EventCounter khand_horde_choice_accepted = 1
			if I_NumberOfSettlements khand = 1
				set_kings_purse khand 6000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements khand = 2
				set_kings_purse khand 4000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements khand = 3
				set_kings_purse khand 3000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements khand = 4
				set_kings_purse khand 2000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements khand >= 5
				set_kings_purse khand 1500
			end_if
		    if I_NumberOfSettlements khand >= 5
			    terminate_monitor
		    end_if
	end_monitor
	
	
	;########################## Script: Ar-Adunaim KP Bonus #########################
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType russia
				set_kings_purse russia 3000
			    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType russia
		and I_TurnNumber >= 1
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia = 1
				set_kings_purse russia 7000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia = 2
				set_kings_purse russia 5000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia = 3
				set_kings_purse russia 4000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia = 4
				set_kings_purse russia 2000
			end_if				
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia >= 5
				set_kings_purse russia 1500
			end_if
		    if I_NumberOfSettlements russia >= 5
			    terminate_monitor
		    end_if
	end_monitor
	
    ;##################### Script: Elven Alliance ########################

    declare_counter eaf_allied
    declare_counter elven_alliance_status

    if I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
        set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion -1
        set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
    end_if

    monitor_event FactionAllianceDeclared FactionType ireland
        and TargetFactionType mongols
        set_counter eaf_allied 1
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status > 4
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event Transgression TransgressionName TC_NULLIFIED_ALLIANCE
        and FactionCultureType greek
        and not FactionType saxons
        and TargetFactionCultureType greek
        and not TargetFactionType saxons
        set_counter eaf_allied 0
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status > 4
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols = 0
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
            set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 4
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over_worsened factions { ireland, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                and I_CharacterTypeNearTile ireland diplomat, 5 325, 413
                historic_event agreement_m true factions { ireland, }
                while I_EventCounter agreement_m_accepted = 0
                    and I_EventCounter agreement_m_declined = 0
                end_while
                set_event_counter agreement_m 0
                if I_EventCounter agreement_m_declined = 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance ireland mongols neutral
                    set_faction_standing ireland mongols 0.0
                    set_faction_standing mongols ireland 0.0
                    historic_event elven_alliance_no_agreement_m factions { ireland, }
                    set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                    set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
                historic_event kith_kin_m factions { ireland, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 5
				give_everything_to_faction mongols ireland false
                set_event_counter elven_alliance_can_build_camp 1
                set_event_counter elven_union 1
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter elven_union 1
			if I_CharacterExists thranduil_1							; Thranduil, Legolas and Orthordir spawn with their custom BG if alive
				kill_character thranduil_1
				spawn_army
					faction ireland
					character	Thranduil, named character, age 32, x 325, y 409, direction S, portrait Thranduil, battle_model thranduil, hero_ability SILVAN, label thranduil_union
					traits		ThranduilUnion 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Sindar 1, HouseOropher 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, Handsome 2, LastAllianceWar 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, KindRuler 2, LivedAges 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategyChivalryGood 1
					unit		Aredhirith		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				end	
				console_command give_ancillary thranduil_union king_woodland_realm
				console_command give_ancillary thranduil_union emeralds_girion
			end_if	
				
			if I_CharacterExists legolas_1
				kill_character legolas_1
				spawn_army
					faction ireland
					character	Legolas, named character, age 18, x 301, y 408, direction S, portrait Legolas, battle_model legolas, hero_ability SILVAN, label legolas_union
					traits		LegolasUnion 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Sindar 1, HouseOropher 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, Handsome 1, Brave 2, GoodAmbusher 3, GoodCommander 3, Just 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 2
					unit		Hin e-Daur		exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				console_command give_ancillary legolas_union troops_silvan
				console_command give_ancillary legolas_union legolas_knife
				console_command give_ancillary legolas_union light_earendil
			end_if
			
			if I_CharacterExists orthordir_1
				kill_character orthordir_1
				spawn_army
					faction ireland
					character	Orthordir, named character, age 20, x 325, y 411, direction S, portrait Orthordir, hero_ability SILVAN, label orthordir_union
					traits		OrthordirUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Sindar 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Elvenkings Gateguard			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				console_command give_ancillary orthordir_union silvan_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary orthordir_union elven_hunter
			end_if	
		end_if							
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 5
            set_faction_standing ireland mongols 1.0
            set_faction_standing mongols ireland 1.0
            console_command diplomatic_stance ireland mongols allied
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 3
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over_worsened factions { ireland, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                move_strat_camera 325, 413
                point_at_strat_position 325, 413
                historic_event kin_folk_parley_m factions { ireland, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 4
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed > 0
            and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status <= 2
            set_event_counter shadow_attack_m 1
            if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 2
            and I_EventCounter shadow_attack_m = 1
            and not I_CharacterExists alliance_invaders_1
            if I_EventCounter visitor_mirkwood_declined = 1
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over factions { ireland, }
                set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 3
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_no_high_summit factions { ireland, }
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 1
                historic_event high_summit_m true factions { ireland, }
                while I_EventCounter high_summit_m_accepted = 0
                    and I_EventCounter high_summit_m_declined = 0
                end_while
                set_event_counter high_summit_m 0
                if I_EventCounter high_summit_m_accepted = 1
                    add_money ireland -3000
                    create_unit Celebrant, Lorien Archers, num 4, exp 2, arm 1, wep 0
                end_if
            end_if
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 0
            and I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 1
            and I_TurnNumber >= 45
            and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
            historic_event visitor_mirkwood true factions { ireland, }
            while I_EventCounter visitor_mirkwood_accepted = 0
                and I_EventCounter visitor_mirkwood_declined = 0
            end_while
            set_event_counter visitor_mirkwood 0
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 1
            if I_EventCounter visitor_mirkwood_declined = 1
                set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType ireland 		; Orthordir spawns if conditions are met after uniting 
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_EventCounter elven_union 1
			
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
				terminate_monitor
			end_if	
			
			if I_EventCounter orthordir_spawned 1				; prevents Orthordir from spawning a second time if spawned and killed before
				terminate_monitor
			end_if	
			
			if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland >= 4
				spawn_army
					faction ireland
					character	Orthordir, named character, age 20, x 325, y 411, direction S, hero_ability SILVAN, portrait Orthordir, label orthordir_union
					traits		OrthordirUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Sindar 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Elvenkings Gateguard			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				historic_event orthordir_promoted factions { ireland, }
				console_command give_ancillary orthordir_union silvan_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary orthordir_union elven_hunter
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType mongols		; Rumil, Orophin and Enpremi spawn if conditions are met after uniting
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_EventCounter elven_union 1
			
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
				terminate_monitor
			end_if	
	
			if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols >= 5						; Enpremi
				and not I_EventCounter enpremi_spawned 1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Enpremi, named character, age 20, x 270, y 329, direction S, portrait Enpremi, battle_model haldir, label enpremi_union, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith
					traits		EnpremiUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Galadhrim Swordsmen			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				historic_event enpremi_promoted factions { mongols, }
				console_command give_ancillary enpremi_union lorien_cloak
				console_command give_ancillary enpremi_union lorien_bow
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType mongols		; Rumil, Orophin and Enpremi spawn if conditions are met after uniting
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_EventCounter elven_union 1
			
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
				terminate_monitor
			end_if	

			if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = mongols				; Rumil
				and not I_EventCounter rumil_spawned 1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Rumil, named character, age 20, x 269, y 329, direction S, portrait rumil, battle_model haldir, label rumil_union, hero_ability SILVAN
					traits		RumilUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				historic_event rumil_promoted factions { mongols, }
				console_command give_ancillary rumil_union galadhrim_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary rumil_union lorien_cloak
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType mongols		; Rumil, Orophin and Enpremi spawn if conditions are met after uniting
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_EventCounter elven_union 1
			
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
				terminate_monitor
			end_if	

			if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols >= 8						; Orophin
				and not I_EventCounter orophin_spawned 1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Orophin, named character, age 20, x 272, y 329, direction S, portrait orophin, battle_model haldir, label orophin_union, hero_ability SILVAN
					traits		OrophinUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				historic_event orophin_promoted factions { mongols, }
				console_command give_ancillary orophin_union galadhrim_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary orophin_union lorien_bow
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland = 0
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
            set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 4
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over_worsened factions { mongols, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                and I_CharacterTypeNearTile mongols diplomat, 5 268, 327
                historic_event agreement true factions { mongols, }
                while I_EventCounter agreement_accepted = 0
                    and I_EventCounter agreement_declined = 0
                end_while
                set_event_counter agreement 0
                if I_EventCounter agreement_declined = 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance mongols ireland neutral
                    set_faction_standing ireland mongols 0.0
                    set_faction_standing mongols ireland 0.0
                    historic_event elven_alliance_no_agreement factions { mongols, }
                    set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                    set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
                if I_EventCounter agreement_accepted = 1
                    historic_event kith_kin factions { mongols, }
                    set_counter elven_alliance_status 5
				    give_everything_to_faction ireland mongols false
                    set_event_counter elven_alliance_can_build_camp 1
					set_event_counter elven_union 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter elven_union 1							; Celeborn, Haldir, Rumil, Orophin and Enpremi spawn with their custom BG if alive
			if I_CharacterExists celeborn_1
				kill_character celeborn_1						; Celeborn
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character 	Celeborn, named character, age 42, x 267, y 327, direction S, portrait Celeborn, battle_model celeborn, hero_ability SILVAN, label celeborn_union
					traits		CelebornUnion 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Sindar 1, HouseElwe 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, Handsome 2, ElvesSauronWar 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, GoodCommander 2, GoodDefender 1, Just 1, LivedAges 1, PoliticsSkill 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Berio I Ngelaidh			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				end
				console_command give_ancillary celeborn_union king_lorien 
				console_command give_ancillary celeborn_union lady_of_lorien
				console_command give_ancillary celeborn_union galadriel_mirror
				console_command give_ancillary celeborn_union nenya
			end_if
			
			if I_CharacterExists haldir_1						; Haldir
				kill_character haldir_1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Haldir, named character, age 16, x 259, y 322, direction S, portrait Haldir, battle_model haldir, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label haldir_union
					traits		HaldirUnion 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, Handsome 1, CommanderMarchwardens 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Galadhrim Archers			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1		
				end
				console_command give_ancillary haldir_union marchwarden
			end_if

			if I_CharacterExists rumil_1						; Rumil
				kill_character rumil_1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Rumil, named character, age 20, x 269, y 329, direction S, portrait rumil, battle_model haldir, label rumil_union, hero_ability SILVAN
					traits		RumilUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				console_command give_ancillary rumil_union galadhrim_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary rumil_union lorien_cloak
			end_if
			
			if I_CharacterExists orophin_1						; Orophin
				kill_character orophin_1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Orophin, named character, age 20, x 272, y 329, direction S, portrait orophin, battle_model haldir, label orophin_union, hero_ability SILVAN
					traits		OrophinUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				console_command give_ancillary orophin_union galadhrim_sentinel
				console_command give_ancillary orophin_union lorien_bow
			end_if
			
			if I_CharacterExists enpremi_1						; Enpremi
				kill_character enpremi_1
				spawn_army
					faction mongols
					character	Enpremi, named character, age 20, x 270, y 329, direction S, portrait Enpremi, battle_model haldir, label enpremi_union, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith
					traits		EnpremiUnion 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Galadhrim Swordsmen			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				console_command give_ancillary enpremi_union lorien_cloak
				console_command give_ancillary enpremi_union lorien_bow				
			end_if
		end_if	
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 5
            set_faction_standing ireland mongols 1.0
            set_faction_standing mongols ireland 1.0
            console_command diplomatic_stance mongols ireland allied
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 3
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over_worsened factions { mongols, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                move_strat_camera 268, 327
                point_at_strat_position 268, 327
                historic_event kin_folk_parley factions { mongols, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 4
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status <= 2
            set_event_counter shadow_attack 1
            if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 2
            and I_EventCounter shadow_attack = 1
            and not I_CharacterExists alliance_invaders_1
            if I_EventCounter visitor_lothlorien_declined = 1
                historic_event elven_alliance_all_over factions { mongols, }
                set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 10
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 3
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 0
                historic_event elven_alliance_no_high_summit factions { mongols, }
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 1
                historic_event high_summit true factions { mongols, }
                while I_EventCounter high_summit_accepted = 0
                    and I_EventCounter high_summit_declined = 0
                end_while
                set_event_counter high_summit 0
                if I_EventCounter high_summit_accepted = 1
                    add_money mongols -3000
                    create_unit Elven_Mirkwood, Woodland Wardens, num 4, exp 2, arm 1, wep 0
                end_if
            end_if
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 0
            and I_CompareCounter eaf_allied = 1
            and I_TurnNumber >= 45
            and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
            historic_event visitor_lothlorien true factions { mongols, }
            while I_EventCounter visitor_lothlorien_accepted = 0
                and I_EventCounter visitor_lothlorien_declined = 0
            end_while
            set_event_counter visitor_lothlorien 0
            set_counter elven_alliance_status 1
            if I_EventCounter visitor_lothlorien_declined = 1
                set_event_counter elven_alliance_rejected 1
                set_counter elven_alliance_status 2
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status > 1
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = -1
            if not I_CharacterExists alliance_invaders_1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            replenish_units alliance_invaders_1
            console_command mp alliance_invaders_1 -1
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion > 0
            spawn_army
                faction slave
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 325, y 19, label eatemp_1
                unit		Territorial Guardsmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            console_command mp eatemp_1 -1
            set_counter sieges_testing 1
            if I_CharacterExists alliance_invaders_1
                replenish_units alliance_invaders_1
                if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = 2
                    set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion -1
                    if I_EventCounter shadow_attack_m = 1
                        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Celebrant
                        and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                        and I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 2 268, 327
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 268, 326
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 268, 326
                            move eatemp_1, 268, 325
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 267, 327
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 267, 327
                            move eatemp_1, 266, 327
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england, named_character, 0 269, 327
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 269, 327
                            move eatemp_1, 269, 328
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england, named_character, 0 269, 328
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 269, 328
                            move eatemp_1, 269, 327
                        end_if
                    end_if
                    if I_EventCounter shadow_attack = 1
                        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Elven_Mirkwood
                        and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                        and I_CharacterTypeNearTile england, named_character, 2, 325, 413
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 326, 414
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 326, 414
                            move eatemp_1, 326, 413
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 326, 413
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 326, 413
                            move eatemp_1, 326, 414
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 324, 413
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 324, 413
                            move eatemp_1, 323, 413
                        end_if
                        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile england named_character 0 325, 414
                            console_command move_character eatemp_1 325, 414
                            move eatemp_1, 326, 414
                        end_if
                    end_if
                    console_command move_character eatemp_1 325, 19
                    console_command give_trait alliance_invaders_1 ScriptedBesieger 0
                    if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                        kill_character eatemp_1
                        if I_EventCounter shadow_attack_m = 1
                            siege_settlement alliance_invaders_1, Celebrant, attack
                            terminate_monitor
                        end_if
                        siege_settlement alliance_invaders_1, Elven_Mirkwood, attack
                        terminate_monitor
                    end_if
                end_if
                console_command mp alliance_invaders_1 -1
            end_if
            set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion -1
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10, label eatemp_2
                traits	ScriptedBesieger 2
                unit		Uruk Bodyguard		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
            console_command move_character eatemp_1 490, 10
            move eatemp_1, 491, 10
            set_counter sieges_testing 0
            destroy_units slave Territorial Guardsmen
            kill_character eatemp_2
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = 0
            and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status = 2
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
                and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Celebrant
                and RandomPercent <= 80
                set_faction_standing ireland england -1.0
                set_faction_standing england ireland -1.0
                console_command diplomatic_stance england ireland war
                historic_event shadow_attack_m factions { ireland, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 1
            end_if
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
                and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Elven_Mirkwood
                and RandomPercent <= 80
                set_faction_standing mongols england -1.0
                set_faction_standing england mongols -1.0
                console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols war
                historic_event shadow_attack factions { mongols, }
                set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = 1
                if I_EventCounter high_summit_m_accepted = 0
                    and I_EventCounter high_summit_accepted = 0
                    spawn_army
                        faction scripts
                        character	ElvenAllianceInvader, named character, age 32, x 325, y 22, label alliance_invaders_1
                        traits	OrcRace 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, NightBattleCapable 1, Loyal 2
                        unit		Uruk Bodyguard			exp 8 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Trolls				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    end
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
                    create_unit alliance_invaders_1, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 3, arm 1, wep 0
                    create_unit alliance_invaders_1, Orc Archers,	num 4, exp 3, arm 0, wep 1
                end_if
                if I_EventCounter high_summit_m_declined = 0
                    and I_EventCounter high_summit_declined = 0
                    spawn_army
                        faction scripts
                        character	ElvenAllianceInvader, named character, age 32, x 325, y 22, label alliance_invaders_1
                        traits	OrcRace 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, NightBattleCapable 1, Loyal 2
                        unit		Uruk Bodyguard			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Trolls				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    end
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
                    create_unit alliance_invaders_1, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 2, arm 1, wep 0
                    create_unit alliance_invaders_1, Orc Archers,	num 4, exp 2, arm 0, wep 1
                end_if
                create_unit alliance_invaders_1, Orc Band,	num 4, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
                if I_EventCounter shadow_attack_m = 1
                    reposition_character alliance_invaders_1, 270, 324
                    siege_settlement alliance_invaders_1, Celebrant, maintain
                    if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Celebrant
                        and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                        console_command mp alliance_invaders_1 -1
                    end_if
                    if I_SettlementUnderSiege Celebrant
                        console_command give_trait alliance_invaders_1 ScriptedBesieger 1
                        set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 2
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_EventCounter shadow_attack = 1
                    reposition_character alliance_invaders_1, 329, 410
                    siege_settlement alliance_invaders_1, Elven_Mirkwood, maintain
                    if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Elven_Mirkwood
                        and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                        move alliance_invaders_1, 325, 411
                    end_if
                    if I_SettlementUnderSiege Elven_Mirkwood
                        console_command give_trait alliance_invaders_1 ScriptedBesieger 1
                        set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion 2
                    end_if
                end_if
                console_command give_trait alliance_invaders_1 Locked 1
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded
        if I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_status > 4
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_EventCounter high_summit_m > 0
            historic_event high_summit_m true factions { ireland, }
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter high_summit > 0
            historic_event high_summit true factions { mongols, }
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter agreement_m > 0
            historic_event agreement_m true factions { ireland, }
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter agreement > 0
            historic_event agreement true factions { mongols, }
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter visitor_mirkwood > 0
            historic_event visitor_mirkwood true factions { mongols, }
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter visitor_lothlorien > 0
            historic_event visitor_lothlorien true factions { ireland, }
        end_if
    end_monitor
	

    ;########################## Script: Gandalf ##########################
	declare_counter gandalf_cd
	declare_counter gandalf_cd_start
	
	set_counter gandalf_cd -1
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			set_event_counter gandalf_rpg 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and I_EventCounter gandalf = 1
		and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists staff_gandalf
		
		if I_CompareCounter gandalf_cd_start = 0
			set_counter gandalf_cd 15
			set_counter gandalf_cd_start 1
		end_if
		
		if I_CompareCounter gandalf_cd > 0
			inc_counter gandalf_cd -1
		end_if
		
		if I_CompareCounter gandalf_cd = 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
	end_monitor	
	
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_TurnNumber >= 40
		and I_EventCounter gandalf_rpg = 1
        and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists staff_gandalf
        if I_EventCounter gandalf = 1
			and I_CompareCounter gandalf_cd = 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                set_event_counter gandalf 2
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                and not I_HotseatEnabled
                    snap_strat_camera 216, 360
                    console_command message_collation_set on
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Weather_Hills = turks
                set_event_counter gandalf 2
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                    and not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                    and not I_HotseatEnabled
                    snap_strat_camera 191, 380
                    console_command message_collation_set on
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter gandalf = 2
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Gandalf, named character, age 22, x 216, y 360, direction S, portrait GandalfWhite, battle_model gandalf_white, hero_ability WHITE_GANDALF, label gandalf_2
                    traits		GandalfWhite 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, MaiaRace 1, HeroAbilityGandalfWhite 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 2, GoodCommander 4, InspiringSpeaker 1, Intelligent 1, Just 2, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategyChivalryGood 2, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, NaturalManagementSkill 1
                    unit		Arthedain Royal Guard		exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end
                if not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                    reposition_character gandalf_1, 191, 380
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 staff_gandalf
                if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narya
                    console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 narya
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 glamdring
                console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 shadowfax
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                and not I_HotseatEnabled
                    console_command message_collation_set off
                    campaign_wait 1
                    historic_event gandalf_return factions { turks, }
                end_if
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter gandalf = 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                set_event_counter gandalf 1
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                    and not I_HotseatEnabled
                    snap_strat_camera 216, 360
                    console_command message_collation_set on
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Weather_Hills = turks
                set_event_counter gandalf 1
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                    and not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                    and not I_HotseatEnabled
                    snap_strat_camera 191, 380
                    console_command message_collation_set on
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter gandalf = 1
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Gandalf, named character, age 22, x 216, y 360, direction S, portrait Gandalf, battle_model gandalf, hero_ability GANDALF, label gandalf_1
                    traits		Gandalf 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, MaiaRace 1, HeroAbilityGandalf 1, Brave 3, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Intelligent 1, Just 2, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategyChivalryGood 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, NaturalManagementSkill 1
                    unit		Cardolan Riders		exp 7 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                    reposition_character gandalf_1, 191, 380
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 staff_gandalf
                console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 glamdring
                if I_CharacterExists cirdan_1
                    console_command remove_ancillary cirdan_1 narya
                    console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 narya
                    historic_event gandalf_cirdan factions { saxons, }
                end_if
                if not I_CharacterExists cirdan_1
                    and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narya
                    console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 narya
                end_if
                if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                    console_command message_collation_set off
                    campaign_wait 1
                    historic_event gandalf factions { turks, }
                    set_event_counter gandalf 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###################### Script: Glittering Caves #####################

    declare_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns
    declare_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter
    declare_counter rohan_dwarves_hostility
    declare_counter rohan_dwarves_request_awaiting_answer
    declare_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Helms_Deep
        and not FactionType milan
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 2
                historic_event rohan_dwarves_uturn_conquered factions { milan, }
                set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 5
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 3
                console_command add_population, Helms_Deep -40
                console_command add_population, Nan_i_Naugrim 40
                destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_abandoned
                historic_event rohan_dwarves_abandoned_conquered factions { milan, }
                set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 5
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status >= 4
                console_command add_population, Helms_Deep -80
                console_command add_population, Nan_i_Naugrim 80
                destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_abandoned
                historic_event rohan_dwarves_abandoned_conquered factions { milan, }
                set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 5
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction hungary = AtWar
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns 0
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_hostility 1
        if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 5
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors = AtWar
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns 0
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_hostility 1
        if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 5
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction norway = AtWar
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns 0
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_hostility 1
        if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 5
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction hungary = Allied
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors < AtWar
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction norway < AtWar
		
		if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status >= 1
			terminate_monitor
        end_if	
		
        inc_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns 1
		
        if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns >= 20
            set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors = Allied
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction hungary < AtWar
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction norway < AtWar
		
		if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status >= 1
			terminate_monitor
        end_if	

        inc_counter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns 1
		
        if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_allied_turns >= 20
            set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if	
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 5
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 4
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 0
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter > 0
                        inc_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter -1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter = 0
                        destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                        console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_upgraded
                        historic_event rohan_dwarves_caves_upgraded factions { milan, }
                        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 5
                        terminate_monitor
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 1
                    console_command add_population, Helms_Deep -150
                    console_command add_population, Nan_i_Naugrim 150
                    destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                    console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_abandoned
                    historic_event rohan_dwarves_abandoned_hostility factions { milan, }
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 3
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 0
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter > 0
                        inc_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter -1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter = 0
                        destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                        console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_completed
                        historic_event rohan_dwarves_caves_completed factions { milan, }
                        set_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter 6
                        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 4
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 1
                    console_command add_population, Helms_Deep -150
                    console_command add_population, Nan_i_Naugrim 150
                    destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
                    console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_abandoned
                    historic_event rohan_dwarves_abandoned_hostility factions { milan, }
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 2
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 0
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter > 0
                        inc_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter -1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter = 0
                        console_command add_population, Helms_Deep 150
                        console_command add_population, Nan_i_Naugrim -150
                        set_event_counter rohan_dwarves_turmoil 1
                        historic_event rohan_dwarves_arrived factions { milan, }
                        set_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter 12
                        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 3
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 1
                    historic_event rohan_dwarves_uturn_hostility factions { milan, }
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_status = 1
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Helms_Deep = milan
                    set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_awaiting_answer 1
                    historic_event rohan_dwarves_request true factions { milan, }
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_hostility = 1
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType milan
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            set_counter rohan_dwarves_hostility 0
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		and I_TurnNumber = 70
		and not FactionIsLocal
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors < AtWar
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction hungary < AtWar
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction norway < AtWar
		
		if I_SettlementOwner Helms_Deep = milan
			destroy_buildings milan hinterland_glittering_caves false
			console_command create_building Helms_Deep glittering_caves_upgraded
			console_command create_unit Helms_Deep "Guard of the Caves" 1 0 0 0
		end_if
		
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType rohan_dwarves_request_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_awaiting_answer 0
        console_command add_money -5000
        set_faction_standing hungary milan 1.0
        set_faction_standing milan hungary 1.0
        historic_event rohan_dwarves_request_success factions { milan, }
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_generic_counter 3
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 2
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType rohan_dwarves_request_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_awaiting_answer 0
        set_faction_standing hungary milan 0.5
        set_faction_standing milan hungary 0.5
        historic_event rohan_dwarves_request_fail factions { milan, }
        set_counter rohan_dwarves_request_status 5
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction milan
            and I_CompareCounter rohan_dwarves_request_awaiting_answer = 1
            campaign_wait 0.1
            historic_event rohan_dwarves_request true factions { milan, }
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;####################### Script: Last Stand ##########################

        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs <= 2
            historic_event last_stand_dunland

            terminate_monitor

			if I_EventCounter dunland_player = 0
				historic_event last_stand_isengard

    end_monitor
