                    kill_character nazgulf_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulf_f12
                    kill_character nazgulf_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulf_f13
                    kill_character nazgulf_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulf_f14
                    kill_character nazgulf_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulf_f15
                    kill_character nazgulf_f15
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulf_f16
                    kill_character nazgulf_f16
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists n7
                    kill_character n7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f1
                    kill_character nazgulg_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f2
                    kill_character nazgulg_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f3
                    kill_character nazgulg_f3
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f4
                    kill_character nazgulg_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f5
                    kill_character nazgulg_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f6
                    kill_character nazgulg_f6
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f7
                    kill_character nazgulg_f7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f8
                    kill_character nazgulg_f8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f9
                    kill_character nazgulg_f9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f10
                    kill_character nazgulg_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f11
                    kill_character nazgulg_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f12
                    kill_character nazgulg_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f13
                    kill_character nazgulg_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f14
                    kill_character nazgulg_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f15
                    kill_character nazgulg_f15
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists n8
                    kill_character n8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f1
                    kill_character nazgulh_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f2
                    kill_character nazgulh_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f3
                    kill_character nazgulh_f3
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f4
                    kill_character nazgulh_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f5
                    kill_character nazgulh_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f6
                    kill_character nazgulh_f6
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f7
                    kill_character nazgulh_f7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f8
                    kill_character nazgulh_f8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f9
                    kill_character nazgulh_f9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f10
                    kill_character nazgulh_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f11
                    kill_character nazgulh_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f12
                    kill_character nazgulh_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f13
                    kill_character nazgulh_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f14
                    kill_character nazgulh_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f15
                    kill_character nazgulh_f15
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists n9
                    kill_character n9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f1
                    kill_character nazguli_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f2
                    kill_character nazguli_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f3
                    kill_character nazguli_f3
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f4
                    kill_character nazguli_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f5
                    kill_character nazguli_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f6
                    kill_character nazguli_f6
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f7
                    kill_character nazguli_f7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f8
                    kill_character nazguli_f8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f9
                    kill_character nazguli_f9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f10
                    kill_character nazguli_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f11
                    kill_character nazguli_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f12
                    kill_character nazguli_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f13
                    kill_character nazguli_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f14
                    kill_character nazguli_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f15
                    kill_character nazguli_f15
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        set_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard -1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor


    monitor_event CeasedFactionLeader Trait Agandaur > 0
        if I_EventCounter agandaur_ring_event = 1
            set_event_counter agandaur_ring_event -1
            set_counter ring_timer 0
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
            increment_kings_purse portugal -4500
            
            set_counter keep_ring_agandaur 0
            
        end_if
        
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CeasedFactionLeader Trait Mazog > 0
        if I_EventCounter mazog_ring_event = 1
            set_event_counter mazog_ring_event -1
            set_counter ring_timer 0
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
            increment_kings_purse gundabad -4500
            
            set_counter keep_ring_mazog 0
            
        end_if
        
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	

    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;######################### Part 5: Mordor ############################

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter endRing != -2
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        set_counter rptesting 1

        ;###### Part A: ring timers
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            and I_CompareCounter endRing = 0
            if I_HotseatEnabled 
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_counter rptesting -1
            inc_counter ring_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 25
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 25
                if I_SettlementOwner Shire_North = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Shire_North
                    snap_strat_camera 133, 385
                    historic_event one_ring_hobbiton
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Imladris
                    snap_strat_camera 246, 384
                    historic_event one_ring_imladris
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Bree = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 130, 257
                    point_at_settlement Bree
                    historic_event one_ring_bree
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 325, 413
                    point_at_settlement Elven_Mirkwood
                    historic_event one_ring_thranduil
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dale = scotland
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 328, 417
                    point_at_settlement Dale
                    historic_event one_ring_dale
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 339, 421
                    point_at_settlement Erebor
                    historic_event one_ring_erebor
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 81, 382
                    point_at_settlement Mithlond
                    historic_event one_ring_mithlond
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dorwinion = byzantium
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 441, 339
                    point_at_settlement Dorwinion
                    historic_event one_ring_carassant
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Nan_i_Naugrim = hungary
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 66, 443
                    point_at_settlement Nan_i_Naugrim
                    historic_event one_ring_thorin
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter rptesting = 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer > 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
                set_counter ring_timer 0
            end_if

            ;###### Part B: Ring Possession Test
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	TemporaryRing, named character,  age 25, x 390, y 482
                unit		Nazg Hai	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing gollum
            end_if
            give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
            console_command mp TemporaryRing -1
            move TemporaryRing, 389, 482
            set_counter rptesting 0
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command remove_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                select_character TemporaryRing ; Terminate Gollum monitor
                kill_character TemporaryRing
                set_counter ring_possession 6
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            kill_character TemporaryRing
        end_if

        ;###### Part C: We don't have the One Ring
        if I_EventCounter RingPossession = 0
            set_counter ring_possession 0
        end_if

        ;###### Part D: We have the One Ring
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = -1
            create_mission giveRingSauron england
            set_counter ring_possession 30
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 1
            historic_event one_ring_acquired_evil
			inc_counter pope_timer 110
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 2
            historic_event ring_deliver2
        end_if
        set_event_counter RingPossession 0 ;cannot invade themselves
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterTurnEndInSettlement SettlementName Gorgoroth
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        and FactionType england
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        set_counter ring_possession -2
    end_monitor

    ;###### The Destruction of Mordor ######

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement TargetFactionType england
        if I_EventCounter mount_doom = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
			if I_LocalFaction england
                console_command kill_faction england ;campaign ends
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter sauron_lost = 1
                set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
                set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
                set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        if I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            set_counter endRing 1
            set_counter ring_timer 0
            set_event_counter ring_deliver 0

            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1

            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
                set_event_counter ring_betrayal 1

                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0

                set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0

                historic_event nazgul_flee
            end_if

            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
                historic_event saruman_triumphs
            end_if
			
			destroy_units england Sauron
            console_command kill_faction england
			
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType relic_ring
        and I_EventCounter ring_betrayal = 1
        console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum
            console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
        end_if

        set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0

        set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0

        historic_event one_ring_betrayal

        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CeasedFactionLeader Trait Sauron = 1
        set_event_counter sauron_ai 0
        if I_EventCounter mount_doom = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
        set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
        if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        historic_event sauron_lost event/sauronlost.bik
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
            and I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 1
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1
            end_if
            if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            end_if
            set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
            campaign_wait 0.1
            destroy_units england Sauron
            console_command kill_faction england
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;###################### Script: Pacify the Dead #####################
; when an enemy faction dies their diplomatic relationships get frozen and the surviving war participant can never ally with the dead faction's allies
; this script resets the relationships of dead factions to fix the issue
; factions with "has_family_tree	no" are excluded because they continue to exist without any characters (cf. vanilla denmark & rebels)
; not checking for I_NumberOfSettlements because that doesn't account for horde factions (idea from Withwnar)

declare_counter faction_is_dead
declare_counter sicily_dead
declare_counter denmark_dead
declare_counter milan_dead
declare_counter normans_dead
declare_counter turks_dead
declare_counter scotland_dead
declare_counter timurids_dead
declare_counter byzantium_dead
declare_counter moors_dead
declare_counter hungary_dead
declare_counter norway_dead
declare_counter saxons_dead
declare_counter ireland_dead
declare_counter mongols_dead
declare_counter teutonic_order_dead
declare_counter venice_dead
declare_counter england_dead
declare_counter poland_dead
declare_counter france_dead
declare_counter aztecs_dead
declare_counter hre_dead
declare_counter gundabad_dead
declare_counter portugal_dead
declare_counter spain_dead
declare_counter russia_dead
declare_counter khand_dead
declare_counter papal_states_dead

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	; hre dead?
	set_counter faction_is_dead 1					; default to true
	if I_FactionLeaderAttribute hre Command < 999		; returns true when the faction has a leader, returns false when not
		set_counter faction_is_dead 0				; set false, if faction leader exists (i.e. has a Command attribute below 999)
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter faction_is_dead == 1
		and I_CompareCounter hre_dead < 1			; prevents the script from cluttering the console
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre venice neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre scotland neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre spain neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre byzantium neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre france neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre russia neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre ireland neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre denmark neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre norway neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre khand neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre gundabad neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre teutonic_order neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre milan neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre aztecs neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre papal_states neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre saxons neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre turks neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre moors neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre hungary neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre portugal neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre sicily neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre timurids neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre england neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre mongols neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre normans neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance hre poland neutral
			set_counter hre_dead 1
			log always DEBUG: +++ RIP HRE +++
	end_if
	; venice dead?
	set_counter faction_is_dead 1
	if I_FactionLeaderAttribute venice Command < 999
		set_counter faction_is_dead 0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter faction_is_dead == 1
		and I_CompareCounter venice_dead < 1
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice scotland neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice spain neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice byzantium neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice france neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice russia neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice denmark neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice ireland neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice norway neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice khand neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice gundabad neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice teutonic_order neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice milan neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice aztecs neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice papal_states neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice saxons neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice turks neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice moors neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice hungary neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice portugal neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice sicily neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice timurids neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice england neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice mongols neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice normans neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice poland neutral
			set_counter venice_dead 1
			log always DEBUG: +++ RIP VENICE +++
	end_if
	; scotland dead?
	set_counter faction_is_dead 1
	if I_FactionLeaderAttribute scotland Command < 999
		set_counter faction_is_dead 0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter faction_is_dead == 1
		and I_CompareCounter scotland_dead < 1
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland hre neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland venice neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland spain neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland byzantium neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland france neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland russia neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland denmark neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland ireland neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland norway neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland khand neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland gundabad neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland teutonic_order neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland milan neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland aztecs neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland papal_states neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland saxons neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland turks neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland moors neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland hungary neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland portugal neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland sicily neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland timurids neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland england neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland mongols neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland normans neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland poland neutral
			set_counter scotland_dead 1
			log always DEBUG: +++ RIP SCOTLAND +++
	end_if
	; spain dead?
	set_counter faction_is_dead 1
	if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Command < 999
		set_counter faction_is_dead 0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter faction_is_dead == 1
		and I_CompareCounter spain_dead < 1
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice neutral
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain scotland neutral

;nazgul off map	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	   and FactionType england		
            send_character_off_map z1
            send_character_off_map z2
            send_character_off_map z3
            send_character_off_map z7
            send_character_off_map z8
		    terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

;Nazgul Stories
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_witchking
		historic_event witch_king factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgulb
		historic_event gan_altan factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgulc
		historic_event balaknar factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazguld
		historic_event khamul factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

		historic_event lagoren  factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

		historic_event leofric factions { england, poland, france, } 
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
;Human Mordor Nazgul Return

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 50
			and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_5 = 0
			spawn_army
				faction england
				character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 371, y 235, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label z1
				unit		Barad-dur Wardens				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			historic_event nazgul_return_5
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
			console_command character_reset z1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 40
			and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_4 = 0
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 373, y 227, portrait nazgul2, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z2
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_4
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
			console_command character_reset z2
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 30
			and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_3 = 0
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulc, named character, age 16, x 369, y 226, portrait nazgul3, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z3
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_3
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
			console_command character_reset z3
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 20
			and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_2 = 0
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulg, named character, age 16, x 377, y 228, portrait nazgul7, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z7
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_2
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
			console_command character_reset z7
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 10
			and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_1 = 0
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulh, named character, age 16, x 373, y 226, portrait nazgul8, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z8
                unit		Temple Marksmen				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_1
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
			console_command character_reset z8
		end_if
	end_monitor

;AI Mordor Nazguls Unlocked

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 50
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 40
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 30
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 20
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 10
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		end_if
	end_monitor

;Unlocking Nazguls if player captures Settlements early

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
		if not I_SettlementOwner Morgul_Vale = england
		and I_TurnNumber < 50
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if not I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
		and I_TurnNumber < 50
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if not I_SettlementOwner Cirith = england
		and I_TurnNumber < 50
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 50
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
;Witch-king to Angmar	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
		if I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = portugal
			and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = portugal
			and I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = portugal
			and not I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
			historic_event nazgul_setoff_carndum
			set_event_counter WKcangotoCD 1
			set_counter nazgula_timer 5
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
				if I_CharacterExists z1
					kill_character z1
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r1

				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r44
					kill_character nazgula_r44
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r45
					kill_character nazgula_r45
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r46
					kill_character nazgula_r46
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r47
					kill_character nazgula_r47
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r48
					kill_character nazgula_r48
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r49
					kill_character nazgula_r49
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r50
					kill_character nazgula_r50
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r51
					kill_character nazgula_r51
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r52
					kill_character nazgula_r52
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r53
					kill_character nazgula_r53
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r54
					kill_character nazgula_r54
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r55
					kill_character nazgula_r55
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r56
					kill_character nazgula_r56
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r57
					kill_character nazgula_r57
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r58
					kill_character nazgula_r58
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r59
					kill_character nazgula_r59
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r60
					kill_character nazgula_r60
				end_if
			end_if
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
    ; This "script" is linked with the "One Ring"
    declare_counter respawn_nazgul
    declare_counter nazgula_timer
    declare_counter nazgulb_timer
    declare_counter nazgulc_timer
    declare_counter nazgulg_timer
    declare_counter nazgulh_timer
    declare_counter nazguli_timer
    declare_counter nazgula_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulb_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulc_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulg_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulh_reborn
    declare_counter nazguli_reborn
    declare_counter nr_Mordor
    declare_counter nazguld_timer
    declare_counter nazgule_timer
    declare_counter nazgulf_timer
    declare_counter nazguld_reborn
    declare_counter nazgule_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulf_reborn
    declare_counter nr_DGolgur

    ; Dol Guldur Destroyed
    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement TargetFactionType poland
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 0
                    and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 13
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### Sauron's Nazguls
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0
        if I_EventCounter sauron_lost = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ;*********** DG Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur < 3
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                and I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguld_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                and I_CompareCounter nazgule_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgule_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulf_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulf_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
                and I_NumberOfSettlements poland > 0
                if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = poland
                    historic_event nazgul_returned_dolguldur
                end_if
                set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
            end_if
        end_if
        ;*********** Mordor Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor < 6
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn < 60
                inc_counter nazgula_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgula_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
						if not I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
							set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
							and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_carndum = 0
							historic_event nazgul_returned_carndum
                            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
							set_event_counter WKcangotoCD 0
                        end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulb_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulc
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 30
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulc_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulc_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulc_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulg
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 20
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulg_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulg_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulg_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulh
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 10
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulh_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulh_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulh_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguli
                and I_CompareCounter nazguli_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguli_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazguli_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
            historic_event nazgul_returned_mordor
            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor = 6
            and I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur = 3
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_carndum
		set_counter nazgula_timer 0
		inc_counter nazgula_reborn 1
		spawn_army
			faction portugal
			character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 204, y 453, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_p1
			traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
			unit		Barad-dur Wardens		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
		end
		if not I_LocalFaction portugal
		console_command give_trait nazgula_p1 AIBoost 1
		end_if
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 ring_witchking
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_flail
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_helmet
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_mordor
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_mordor = -1
            set_counter nr_Mordor 6
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
            set_counter nazgula_timer 0
            inc_counter nazgula_reborn 1
			if I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn = 60
				spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 370, y 232, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_r60
					traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
					unit		Barad-dur Wardens		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit 		Orc Band		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Orc Scouts		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				if not I_LocalFaction england
					console_command give_trait nazgula_r60 AIBoost 1
				end_if
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 ring_witchking
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 witchking_flail
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 witchking_helmet
            end_if			
			if I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn = 59
				spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 370, y 232, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_r59

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_dolguldur
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_dolguldur = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer = 14
            set_counter nazguld_timer 0
            inc_counter nazguld_reborn 1
            if I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn = 50
                spawn_army
                    faction poland
                    character	Nazguld, named character, age 16, x 299, y 327, direction SW, portrait nazgul4, battle_model khamul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label nazguld_r50
                    traits	Nazgul 4, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 2, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2, NazgulEpithet 4
                    unit		Khamuls Shadowknights		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Mirkwood Spears	exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Dol Guldur Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end
                if not I_LocalFaction poland
                    console_command give_trait nazguld_r50 AIBoost 1
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary nazguld_r50 ring_nazguld
                console_command give_ancillary nazguld_r50 blade_khamul
                inc_counter nr_DGolgur 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn = 49
                spawn_army
                    faction poland
                    character	Nazguld, named character, age 16, x 299, y 327, direction SW, portrait nazgul4, battle_model khamul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label nazguld_r49

    ;###### Saruman's Nazguls
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ImmortalNazgulsIsengard
        if I_EventCounter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
            and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer < 340
            inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 340
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f17
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f17 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f17
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f17, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 320
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f16
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f16 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f16
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f16, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 300
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f15

;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ;garrison creation

	declare_counter garrison	
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Anduin_Vale_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Anduin_Vale
		
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Vale = timurids
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
            console_command create_unit Anduin_Vale "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 1 1 1
        end_if
		set_counter garrison 1		
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Gap_of_Rohan_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Gap_of_Rohan
		
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner Gap_of_Rohan = milan
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            console_command create_unit Gap_of_Rohan "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 4 1 1
        end_if	
		set_counter garrison 1	
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf West_Emnet_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege West_Emnet
		
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner West_Emnet = milan
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
            console_command create_unit West_Emnet "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 3 1 1
        end_if
		set_counter garrison 1				
	end_monitor

;###### Dynamic Garrison Script: Return To Your Tasks! Destroy Garrison #######

    monitor_event PostBattle I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
		and not WasAttacker
		and WonBattle
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreBattleWithdrawal I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

declare_counter pu1_missile
declare_counter pu2_missile
declare_counter pu3_missile
declare_counter pu4_missile
declare_counter pu5_missile
declare_counter pu6_missile
declare_counter pu7_missile
declare_counter pu8_missile
declare_counter pu9_missile
declare_counter pu10_missile
declare_counter pu11_missile
declare_counter pu12_missile
declare_counter pu13_missile
declare_counter pu14_missile
declare_counter pu15_missile
declare_counter pu16_missile
declare_counter pu17_missile
declare_counter pu18_missile
declare_counter pu19_missile
declare_counter pu20_missile
declare_counter labels_set
declare_counter player_unit_count
declare_counter enemy_unit_count
declare_counter attacker_missile
declare_counter defender_missile
declare_counter protect_siege
declare_counter open_battle
declare_counter elephant_fix
declare_counter elephant_gate
declare_counter script_delay
declare_counter general_wait
declare_counter ob_under_fire
declare_counter ob_engaged
declare_counter control_union
declare_counter ai_reinforcements
declare_counter gates_destroyed
declare_counter player_breached
declare_counter ai_breached
declare_counter g5_special
declare_counter g5_special_2
declare_counter g5_special_3
declare_counter battle_start
declare_counter ha_fix
declare_counter panel_check
declare_counter rally_walls
declare_counter del_objective
declare_counter elephant_fix_check
declare_counter elephant_gate_tier2
declare_counter second_ring
declare_counter elephant_gate_tier3
declare_counter third_ring
declare_counter engage_enemy
declare_counter obj_set1
declare_counter obj_set0

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral CharacterIsLocal
and FactionType turks
and I_EventCounter control_turks = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral TrueCondition
and not CharacterIsLocal
and TargetFactionType turks
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_EventCounter control_turks = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence CharacterIsLocal
and FactionType turks
and I_EventCounter control_turks = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TrueCondition
and not CharacterIsLocal
and TargetFactionType turks
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_EventCounter control_turks = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral CharacterIsLocal
and FactionType england
and I_EventCounter control_england = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral TrueCondition
and not CharacterIsLocal
and TargetFactionType england
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_EventCounter control_england = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence CharacterIsLocal
and FactionType england
and I_EventCounter control_england = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TrueCondition
and not CharacterIsLocal
and TargetFactionType england
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_EventCounter control_england = 1

    set_counter control_union 1

end_monitor



monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed prebattle_fight_button

    ;;;;;;;
    set_counter labels_set 0
    set_counter player_unit_count 0
    set_counter enemy_unit_count 0
    set_counter open_battle 0
    set_counter engage_enemy 0
    set_counter ai_reinforcements 0
    set_counter player_breached 0
    set_counter ai_breached 0
    set_counter gates_destroyed 0
    ;;;;;;;
    set_counter pu1_missile 0
    set_counter pu2_missile 0
    set_counter pu3_missile 0
    set_counter pu4_missile 0
    set_counter pu5_missile 0
    set_counter pu6_missile 0
    set_counter pu7_missile 0
    set_counter pu8_missile 0
    set_counter pu9_missile 0
    set_counter pu10_missile 0
    set_counter pu11_missile 0
    set_counter pu12_missile 0
    set_counter pu13_missile 0
    set_counter pu14_missile 0
    set_counter pu15_missile 0
    set_counter pu16_missile 0
    set_counter pu17_missile 0
    set_counter pu18_missile 0
    set_counter pu19_missile 0
    set_counter pu20_missile 0
    set_counter script_delay 0
    ;;;;;;;Elephant Fix
    set_counter elephant_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_gate 0
    ;;;;;;;Protect General
    set_counter general_wait 0
    ;;;;;;;Open Battles
    set_counter ob_under_fire 0
    set_counter ob_engaged 0
    ;;;;;;;Special Ability
    set_counter g5_special 0
    set_counter g5_special_2 0
    set_counter g5_special_3 0
    set_counter ha_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_gate 0
    set_counter elephant_gate_tier2 0
    set_counter elephant_gate_tier3 0
    set_counter elephant_fix_check 0
    set_counter rally_walls 0
    set_counter second_ring 0
    set_counter third_ring 0
    set_counter del_objective 0
    set_counter obj_set1 0
    set_counter obj_set0 0
    prepare_for_battle

end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
and I_CompareCounter labels_set = 0

    battle_wait 0.1

    set_counter battle_start 1

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    log always ------------------------set labels-------------------------------------
    ;;;Army 1
    set_counter player_unit_count 0

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 0 0 0 a1u1
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
    label_unit 0 0 1 a1u2
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
    label_unit 0 0 2 a1u3
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 3
    label_unit 0 0 3 a1u4
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 4
    label_unit 0 0 4 a1u5
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 5
    label_unit 0 0 5 a1u6
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 6
    label_unit 0 0 6 a1u7
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 7
    label_unit 0 0 7 a1u8
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 8
    label_unit 0 0 8 a1u9
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 9
    label_unit 0 0 9 a1u10
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 10
    label_unit 0 0 10 a1u11
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 11
    label_unit 0 0 11 a1u12
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 12
    label_unit 0 0 12 a1u13
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 13
    label_unit 0 0 13 a1u14
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 14
    label_unit 0 0 14 a1u15
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 15
    label_unit 0 0 15 a1u16
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 16
    label_unit 0 0 16 a1u17
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 17
    label_unit 0 0 17 a1u18
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 18
    label_unit 0 0 18 a1u19
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 20
    label_unit 0 0 19 a1u20
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
end_if

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
;    and ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    ;;;Army 2

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 1
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 2
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 3
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 4
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 5
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 6
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 7
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 8
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 9
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 10
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 11
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 12
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 13
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 14
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 15
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 16
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15 a1u16
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 17
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15 a1u16 a1u17
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 18
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15 a1u16 a1u17 a1u18
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 19
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15 a1u16 a1u17 a1u18 a1u19
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 20
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4 a1u5 a1u6 a1u7 a1u8 a1u9 a1u10 a1u11 a1u12 a1u13 a1u14 a1u15 a1u16 a1u17 a1u18 a1u19 a1u20
    end_if
end_if

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
;    and ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 1
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 2
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 3
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 4
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 5
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 6
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 7
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 8
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 9
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 10
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 11
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 12
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 13
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 14
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 15
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 16
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15 a2u16
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 17
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15 a2u16 a2u17
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 18
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15 a2u16 a2u17 a2u18
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 19
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15 a2u16 a2u17 a2u18 a2u19
    end_if
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 20
    define_unit_group army2 a2u1 a2u2 a2u3 a2u4 a2u5 a2u6 a2u7 a2u8 a2u9 a2u10 a2u11 a2u12 a2u13 a2u14 a2u15 a2u16 a2u17 a2u18 a2u19 a2u20
    end_if
end_if

if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    ;;;Army 1
    log always ------------------------set labels-------------------------------------
    set_counter enemy_unit_count 0
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 0 0 0 a1u1
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 1

    set_counter player_unit_count 0
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 1 0 0 a2u1
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1

    end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count >= 15
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u15 > 0
		set_counter pu15_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u15 = horde
		set_counter pu15_missile 2
	end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count >= 16
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u16 > 0
		set_counter pu16_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u16 = horde
		set_counter pu16_missile 2
    end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count >= 17
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u17 > 0
		set_counter pu17_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u17 = horde
		set_counter pu17_missile 2
    end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count >= 18
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u18 > 0
		set_counter pu18_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u18 = horde
		set_counter pu18_missile 2
    end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count >= 19
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u19 > 0
		set_counter pu19_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u19 = horde
		set_counter pu19_missile 2
    end_if
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter player_unit_count = 20
    if I_UnitPercentageAmmoLeft a2u20 > 0
		set_counter pu20_missile 1
		inc_counter defender_missile 1
		inc_counter attacker_missile -1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_UnitFormation a2u20 = horde
		set_counter pu20_missile 2
    end_if
    end_if

    end_if

    end_if
end_if

    if not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
		set_counter open_battle 1
        set_counter ha_fix 1
        log always ------------------------open battle set-------------------------------------
    end_if

    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
		set_counter elephant_fix 1
        log always ------------------------elephant fix enabled-------------------------------------
    end_if

set_counter labels_set 1
end_monitor

monitor_event BattleConflictPhaseCommenced FactionIsLocal

    battle_wait 5

    if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        if I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
            ai_gta_plan_set 0 ATTACK_SETTLEMENT
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_SETTLEMENT (start)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
        end_if
        if I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
            ai_gta_plan_set 0 SALLY_OUT
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set 1 SALLY_OUT (start)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1
            ai_gta_add_objective 0 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set0 1
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (enemy missile > 10)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 0 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL (start)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
        end_if
    end_if

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        if I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1
            if I_CompareCounter attacker_missile < 5
                ai_gta_add_objective 1 DEFEND_LINE 999
                set_counter obj_set1 1
                log always ------------------------ai_gta_add_objective DEFEND_LINE (enemy missile < 10)-------------------------------------
                ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_FEATURE
                log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set DEFEND_FEATURE (enemy missile < 10)-------------------------------------
                battle_wait 1
                ai_active_set on
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter attacker_missile >= 5
                ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
                set_counter obj_set1 1
                log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (enemy missile > 10)-------------------------------------
                ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
                log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL (enemy missile > 10)-------------------------------------
                battle_wait 1
                ai_active_set on
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
            ai_gta_add_objective 1 DEFEND_LINE 999
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_add_objective 1 DEFEND_LINE (start)-------------------------------------
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_SETTLEMENT
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_SETTLEMENT (start)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
        end_if
        if I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
            ai_gta_add_objective 1 DEFEND_LINE 999
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_LINE (start)-------------------------------------
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_FEATURE
            log always ------------------------ai_gta_plan_set DEFEND_FEATURE (DEFEND_FEATURE start)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
        end_if
    end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event BattleReinforcementsArrive not ArmyIsLocal
and not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
and not I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle


    set_counter ai_reinforcements 1
    log always ------------------------ai reinforcement arrive waite-------------------------------------
    battle_wait 200
    set_counter ai_reinforcements 2
    log always ------------------------ai reinforcement arrive go-------------------------------------

end_monitor

monitor_event BattleReinforcementsArrive ArmyIsLocal

    log always -------------------------- player reinforcements arrive--------------------------
    battle_wait 7
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute oathbreakers_unit > 0
        inc_counter oathbreaker_timer 1
    end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event BattleWallsCaptured TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter player_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - player breached-------------------------------------
    end_if

    if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter ai_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - ai breached-------------------------------------
    end_if
    
end_monitor

monitor_event BattleBattleGatesDestroyedByEngine TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle

    if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter ai_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - ai breached-------------------------------------
    end_if
    
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter gates_destroyed 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - gates destroyed------------------------------------
    end_if
    
end_monitor


monitor_event BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    set_counter player_breached 1
    log always ------------------------ ai set - player breached-------------------------------------

end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    battle_wait 20

    log always -------------------------ai defending---------------

    set_counter ob_engaged 0
    set_counter ob_under_fire 0
	if I_CompareCounter enemy_unit_count > 0
    if I_IsUnitUnderFire a2u1
    inc_counter ob_under_fire 2
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 fighting
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 pursuing
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 charging
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 missiles_firing
    inc_counter ob_under_fire -1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 missiles_reloading
    inc_counter ob_under_fire -1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter enemy_unit_count > 1
    if I_IsUnitUnderFire a2u2
    inc_counter ob_under_fire 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u2 fighting
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u2 pursuing
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u2 charging
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u2 missiles_firing
    inc_counter ob_under_fire -1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u2 missiles_reloading
    inc_counter ob_under_fire -1
    end_if

    if I_IsUnitUnderFire a2u3
    inc_counter ob_under_fire 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u3 fighting

    end_if
